nodes.text: The PX-7 Recon Droid was a model of probe droid available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The PX-7 was designed to infiltrate enemy lines, using long-range sensors and laser defensive protocols. The Twi'lek arms dealer Olok the Shadow sold PX-7 Recon Droids in his auction on Darvannis.

PX-7 Recon Droids appear as one of the four types of droid enemies in the Olok the Shadow boss encounter in the Operation "Scum and Villainy," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
